channel.title: Changing Filament :: CID guide website
channel.description: To change filament on the LulzBot, first open the Cura LulzBot application, and navigate to the monitor tab. image Click the Connect button and wait a few seconds. Eventually the box at the top will read Connected to Printer. Once that happens move back to the right menu. Click the Pre-Heat buttons on the Hot End section only. Image Then wait until the larger black number changes to match the smaller grey number.
